It is a herbaceous perennial with small, clustered flowers that bloom in shades of white and pale purple. The plant has a compact growth habit, typically reaching only a few inches in height, and features narrow, grass-like leaves. It thrives in cool, moist environments and is adapted to the harsh conditions of its mountainous habitat.
